index.headline: Welcome to your new app!
index.text: Your app was created with Bootify.io and can now be customized. If you are happy with the result, please recommend us to other developers - so Bootify.io can grow further.

page.headline: Error
page.message: The page you are looking for is not available right now.

delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete this element? This cannot be undone.

maxlength: Your value must have a length of less then ${max} characters.

numeric.format: Please provide a valid numeric number.
numeric.digits: Your provided value is out of the valid range: <{{precision}} digits>.<{{scale}} digits> expected.
